column4: Hi guys, I'm trying to install race for the galaxy on my machine. I have downloaded the files from here http://www.keldon.net/rftg/ and got the following error
gui.c:21: fatal error: gtk/gtk.h: No such file or directory
What do I need to install (apart from libgtk2.0-dev which is installed)?
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
